sect1.title: Integrator
sect1.para: Ondex is used to visualize networks produced by running a workflow (traditionally written in xml format). The "Integrator" allows users to prepare and run a workflow within Ondex.

All of the available steps are documented under "Developer\Document". A simple example for a workflow is to first select parsers (to import data) then do select mapping methods and, finally, to select some filtering so as to improve the quality of the graph. See tutorial for more information.
